org.mocksy.config
Interface Source

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileXmlSource, StringXmlSource, UrlXmlSource, XmlSource
public interface Source

Abstraction of the source of a ruleset, rule, response file or filter components.

Method Summary
 Source getRelativeSource(String relativePath)
          Returns a new Source object relative to the current one.
 URL getRelativeURL(String relativePath)
          Returns a URL reference to a resource relative to the current Source.
 boolean needsUpdate()
          Returns whether or not this source has changed recently.

Returns whether or not this source has changed recently.
